name: Zinnki
passiveDesc: For each of the team members alive including Zinnki, Zinnki gains 16% DMG Bonus.
rTalentDesc: Zinnki's Normal and Charged Attacks generate 1 Flux.
normalAttackDesc: Zinnki releases 3 Crystal Shards, each dealing 8 (+12% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG.
chargedAttackDesc: Zinnki extracts 3 Crystal Shards out of the targeted opponent and pierce them, each dealing 13 (+18% Physical ATK) as Physcial DMG.
normalSkillDesc: Zinnki's paralyzes the selected team member and enters Quantum Tunneling. In this state, they will share the same HP inherited from the member whose HP is greater than the other, and 60% of the paralyzed member's Physical ATK, Magic PWR, Physical DEF, and Magic DEF will be transferred to Zinnki. Zinnki will passively generate 8 Surges per Cycle during this state. Casting this skill will exit this state.
riftedSkillDesc: If Zinnki has 60 Surges or more, Zinnki absorbs all quantum shards and releases the energy to the target dealing 114 (+44% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG. If Zinnki has full Surge, the DMG is converted into Quantum DMG.
fragment1Desc: Zinnki's Normal and Charged Attacks will generate an extra Crystal Shard.
fragment2Desc: Zinnki's will inherit CRIT Rate, and CRIT DMG of the paralyzed member during Quantum Tunneling.
fragment4Desc: Zinnki's Energy Efficiency is increased by 20%. Casting Crystal Borrow will reduces the opponent's Physical RES by 60% and Quantum RES by 40%.
fragment6Desc: During Quantum Tunneling, Zinnki gains 40% Quantum DMG Bonus and her Normal and Charged Attacks are converted into Quantum DMG.
